game.name: Hyper Knights
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 찌르고 습격하고 군대를 키우며 강력한 콤보를 배우고 땅을 되찾으세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Slash and Dash, raise your army, learn powerful combos and take back your land!
